header.title: did:web set-up
header.description: Follow this guide to verify ownership of your web domain. This verification involves adding a file to the .well-known directory of your domain, confirming your control over it.

steps.title: Follow these steps carefully to ensure a successful verification.
steps.1: Locate the .well-known folder of your domain. In case it is not yet available, create a new folder with the following name: .well-known
steps.3: Upload the did.json file to the .well-know folder of your domain.

verification.title: did verification
verification.description:
We will now verify the did.json file in your .well-known folder of your domain. DNS propagation can vary in time. Please allow a few minutes for the verification process to detect your changes.
You may close the process and leave this page.
